overview: Editor and short filmmaker Carlos Agulló chooses a particularly difficult subject to begin his career as a documentary filmmaker with Los demás días: the moving daily life of Dr. Pablo Iglesias, a palliative care doctor, who shows us the demanding and emotional gaze of those who have to face death and offers us a whole lesson in life.
tagline: If you take life as a fight against death, you're done
title: All the Other Days
